item.title: 美国驱逐航空公司 GlobalX 网站遭黑客篡改
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发起的驱逐到萨尔瓦多离岸拘留中心运动的中心航空公司的一个网站遭到黑客篡改。【原文：The airline at the center of President Donald Trump's campaign of deportations to an offshore detention center in El Salvador has had one of its websites defaced by hackers.】

item.title: 参议院最高民主党人要求调查纽瓦克航班问题
item.description: 参议院民主党领袖查克-舒默（Chuck Schumer）周一呼吁对曼哈顿郊外纽瓦克机场因设备和人员问题而导致航班持续中断的事件进行调查。【原文：Senate Democratic Leader Chuck Schumer on Monday called for a probe into a probe into ongoing flight disruptions at Newark airport outside Manhattan that have disrupted hundreds of flights over the last eight days because of equipment and staffing issues.】

item.title: 哈达德称巴西经济每年可增长 3
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）周一表示，巴西有条件以年均 3% 的速度增长，这是总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）政府的目标。【原文：Brazilian Finance Minister Fernando Haddad said on Monday the country has the conditions to grow at an average pace of 3% per year, which is the goal of President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva's administration.】

item.title: 瑞士信贷与美国司法部就税务案达成协议，将支付 5.11 亿美元
item.description: 瑞银集团周一表示，在与美国司法部达成协议后，瑞士信贷服务公司将支付 5.11 亿美元，以执行其 2014 年在税务问题上的认罪协议。【原文：UBS said on Monday that Credit Suisse Services will pay $511 million after reaching an agreement with the U.S. Department of Justice for its implementation of its 2014 guilty plea in tax matters.】

item.title: 特朗普顾问使用的应用程序称，在接到黑客攻击报告后暂时停止服务
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的前国家安全顾问迈克-瓦尔兹（Mike Waltz）使用的通信应用程序称，在据报道黑客攻击暴露了其部分信息后，该应用程序将暂时停止服务。【原文：The communications app used by U.S. President Donald Trump's former national security adviser, Mike Waltz, says it is temporarily suspending services following a reported hack that exposed some of its messages.】

item.title: 改变重组计划，OpenAI 将继续由非营利组织控制
item.description: OpenAI 将继续由一家非营利组织控制，这家处于人工智能生成热潮核心的初创公司周一表示，在此之前几个月，该公司曾概述了改革其结构以创建一家公益公司的计划，这将使其更容易筹集资金。【原文：OpenAI will remain under the control of a non-profit, the startup at the heart of the generative artificial intelligence boom said on Monday, months after it outlined plans to revamp its structure to create a public benefit corporation that would make it easier to raise capital.】

item.title: 特朗普政府寻求对反竞争法规进行身份认证
item.description: 美国政府周一表示，美国联邦贸易委员会和司法部正在努力查明反竞争的政府法规。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission and the Department of Justice are seeking to identify anticompetitive government regulations, the administration said on Monday.】

item.title: 美联储会议前，债券投资者坚持中性立场
item.description: 在美联储本周召开为期两天的货币政策会议之前，债券投资者采取了中性立场，这反映了他们对美国贸易政策的持续谨慎态度，因为该政策有可能使世界最大经济体陷入衰退。【原文：Bond investors have taken a neutral stance in the run-up to the Federal Reserve's two-day monetary policy meeting this week, reflecting continued caution over U.S. trade policy that threatens to plunge the world's largest economy into recession.】

item.title: Rivian 将耗资 1.2 亿美元在伊利诺伊州建设供应商园区，以降低关税相关成本
item.description: Rivian 周一表示，公司将投资 1.2 亿美元，将其关键零部件供应商引入伊利诺伊州的工厂附近，因为这家电动汽车制造商正努力降低美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对墨西哥和加拿大征收关税的影响。【原文：Rivian said on Monday that it will invest $120 million to bring its key parts suppliers near its plant in Illinois, as the electric vehicle-maker seeks to lower the impact of U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs on Mexico and Canada.】

item.title: 墨西哥 Banorte 公司退出对 Banamex 的潜在竞购
item.description: 墨西哥银行 Banorte 首席执行官马科斯-拉米雷斯（Marcos Ramirez）在周一发表的一篇采访中告诉当地报纸《Milenio》，Banorte 不考虑竞购花旗银行去年在墨西哥分拆的零售部门 Banamex。【原文：Mexican lender Banorte is not considering making a bid for Banamex, Citi's one-time retail unit in the country which it split off last year, CEO Marcos Ramirez told local newspaper Milenio in an interview published on Monday.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司为价值 160 亿美元的智利绿色氢气项目申请许可
item.description: 周一的一份监管文件显示，能源巨头道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）的子公司已为智利南部一个价值 160 亿美元的绿色氢气和合成氨项目申请环境许可证。【原文：Subsidiaries of energy major TotalEnergies have applied for an environmental permit for a $16 billion green hydrogen and ammonia project in southern Chile, a regulatory filing showed on Monday.】

item.title: 摩根大通称人工智能有助于在市场动荡中提高销售额和增加客户数量
item.description: 摩根大通资产与财富管理首席执行官表示，摩根大通的人工智能工具使其能够提高对富裕客户的销售额，即使在 4 月份的市场衰退期间也能管理来自忧虑客户的大量请求。【原文：JPMorgan Chase's artificial intelligence tools enabled it to boost sales to wealthy clients and manage scores of requests from worried customers even during April's market rout, the bank's CEO of asset and wealth management said.】

item.title: 据 Business Insider 报道，谷歌成立了新的影视制作部门
item.description: 据《商业内幕》（Business Insider）周一报道，Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司发起了一项名为 "100 个零"（100 Zeros）的新的电影和电视制作计划，致力于寻找这家科技巨头可以帮助资助或制作的项目。【原文：Alphabet's Google has launched a new film and TV production initiative called "100 Zeros" to focus on identifying projects that the tech giant can help fund or produce, Business Insider reported on Monday.】

item.title: 凯雷首席执行官哈维?
item.description: 凯雷集团首席执行官哈维-施瓦茨（Harvey Schwartz）表示，该公司正在积极寻找机会，将公司 800 亿美元的部分自由资金用于新的投资。【原文：Harvey Schwartz, CEO of the Carlyle Group, says his firm is actively seeking opportunities to deploy some of the firm's $80 billion in free capital into new investments.】

item.title: 花旗集团首席执行官称大多数客户可承受 10%的关税
item.description: 花旗集团首席执行官简-弗雷泽（Jane Fraser）周一表示，该银行的大多数客户都能承受美国对其贸易伙伴征收的10%的关税，但她告诫说，在经济形势更加明朗之前，企业正在等待投资和招聘。【原文：Citigroup CEO Jane Fraser said on Monday most of the bank's clients could absorb U.S. tariffs of 10% the nation's trading partners, but cautioned companies are waiting on investments and hiring until there is more economic clarity.】

item.title: YPF 与以色列 XtraLit 公司将在阿根廷开发直接提锂项目
item.description: 阿根廷国家能源公司 YPF 周一表示，它将与以色列公司 XtraLit 合作，在南美国家共同开发直接提锂（DLE）项目。【原文：Argentina's state energy company YPF on Monday said it is partnering with Israel-based firm XtraLit to jointly develop direct lithium extraction (DLE) projects in the South American country.】

item.title: 在关税生效之际，伯克希尔的布鲁克斯跑步公司致力于东南亚地区的发展
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）旗下的布鲁克斯跑步公司（Brooks Running）首席执行官表示，即使美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提议的关税意味着消费者将为其高性能跑鞋支付更高的价格，该公司仍将致力于保持在东南亚的生产。【原文：Brooks Running, which is owned by Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway , is committed to keeping production in southeast Asia even if U.S. President Donald Trump's proposed tariffs mean consumers will pay more for its performance running shoes, its chief executive said.】

item.title: 苹果将就 Epic Games 诉 App Store 藐视法庭案的裁决提起上诉
item.description: 苹果公司周一提起上诉，挑战美国法官的裁决，该裁决命令这家科技公司立即开放其利润丰厚的应用程序商店（App Store），以迎接更多的竞争。【原文：Apple on Monday lodged an appeal to challenge a U.S. judge’s ruling that ordered the tech company to immediately open its lucrative App Store to more competition.】

item.title: 苹果两年来首次发行债券成为繁忙初选的头条新闻
item.description: 根据美国证券交易委员会（SEC）的文件，苹果公司周一宣布发行四期债券，这是其两年来首次发行债券，预计募集资金将用于回购股票、偿还未偿债务及其他用途。【原文：Apple on Monday announced a four-tranche bond offering, its first in two years, with proceeds expected to be used to repurchase stock, repay outstanding debt among other purposes, according to its SEC filing.】

item.title: 贝森特表示，特朗普的关税、减税和放松管制议程将推动投资流向美国
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周一表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税、减税和放松管制议程将共同推动对美国经济的长期投资，并补充说美国金融市场是 "反脆弱 "的，将经受住任何短期动荡的考验。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Monday said President Donald Trump's tariff, tax-cut and deregulation agenda would work together to drive long-term investment to the U.S. economy, adding that U.S. financial markets were "antifragile" and would weather any short-term turbulence.】

item.title: 通用汽车任命内部人士邓肯-奥尔德里德（Duncan Aldred）领导北美业务
item.description: 通用汽车公司（General Motors）周一任命内部人士邓肯-奥尔德里德（Duncan Aldred）为北美业务总裁，立即生效，几天前该汽车制造商因担心美国关税而下调了 2025 年的利润预期。【原文：General Motors on Monday named insider Duncan Aldred the president of its North America business, effective immediately, days after the automotive manufacturer cut its 2025 profit forecast on concerns over U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 德国商业银行员工将在年会上抗议联合信贷银行可能的收购行为
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank）员工代表呼吁员工抗议意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）可能进行的收购，这表明对任何交易的抵制依然激烈。【原文：Commerzbank employee representatives are calling on staff to protest against a possible takeover by the Italian bank UniCredit , signalling that resistance to any deal remains fierce.】

item.title: 墨西哥制定措施避免钢铁和纺织品倾销
item.description: 墨西哥经济部长马塞洛-埃布拉德（Marcelo Ebrard）周一表示，墨西哥已采取措施打击大量低价进口钢铁和纺织品的行为，这种行为被称为倾销。【原文：Mexico has rolled out measures to fight against a flood of low-cost imports of steel and textiles, Economy Minister Marcelo Ebrard said on Monday, a practice known as dumping.】

item.title: 以色列 eToro 在美国 IPO 的目标估值为 40 亿美元
item.description: 以色列 eToro 集团周一表示，其在美国首次公开募股的目标估值高达 40 亿美元。【原文：Israel's eToro Group said on Monday it was targeting a valuation of up to $4 billion in its initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: 美国服务业 4 月份回暖；价格压力上升
item.description: 由于订单增加，4月份美国服务业增长回升，从而推动衡量企业支付材料和服务价格的指标达到两年多来的最高水平，这表明关税导致的通胀压力正在增加。【原文：The U.S. services sector's growth picked up in April as orders increased, boosting a measure of prices paid by businesses for materials and services to the highest level in more than two years, signaling a building up in inflation pressures due to tariffs.】

item.title: 意大利时装集团 OTB 评估在美国的涨价幅度
item.description: 意大利时装集团 OTB 旗下拥有 Diesel、Jil Sander 和 Maison Margiela 等品牌，该集团首席执行官周一表示，如果贸易关税得到确认，该集团正在评估在美国的提价幅度。【原文：Italian fashion group OTB, which owns brands such as Diesel, Jil Sander and Maison Margiela, is assessing the extent of price increases in the United States if trade tariffs are confirmed, the group's CEO said on Monday.】

item.title: 芯片制造商 Onsemi 预测季度营收将因电动汽车制造商的强劲需求而增长
item.description: 尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对汽车进口征收关税给经济带来了不确定性，但电动汽车用芯片的需求依然保持强劲，因此 Onsemi 公司周一预计第二季度营收将高于华尔街预期。【原文：Onsemi forecast second-quarter revenue above Wall Street expectations on Monday, as demand for its chips used in electric vehicles remains resilient despite economic uncertainty brought on by U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs on auto imports.】

item.title: 鞋类品牌 Skechers 将在 90 亿美元的交易中被私有化
item.description: 鞋业公司 Skechers 周一表示，已同意被投资公司 3G Capital 收购，交易价值 94 亿美元。【原文：Footwear company Skechers said on Monday it had agreed to be acquired by investment firm 3G Capital in a deal worth $9.4 billion.】

item.title: 印度 IT 公司 Coforge 盈利不及预期，原因是成本增加
item.description: 印度 Coforge 公司公布的第四季度利润低于预期，原因是这家 IT 服务公司受到了支出增加的影响。【原文：India's Coforge posted fourth-quarter profit below estimates, as the IT services company was hurt by increased expenses.】

item.title: 康明斯因关税问题撤回 2025 年财务预测
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）全面征收进口关税带来的不确定性不断增加，康明斯周一撤回了其年度预测，与其他汽车制造商一起重新评估预期。【原文：Cummins withdrew its annual forecast on Monday, joining other vehicle manufacturers that are reassessing expectations as the industry grapples with the mounting uncertainty generated by U.S. President Donald Trump's sweeping import tariffs.】
